description: This file defines a data class for application settings, functions to read environment variables, and a main function to load and return configuration settings based on environment variables. It handles parsing of environment variables for persistence backend type, SQLite database path, CORS origins, and basic authentication credentials.

classes.name: Settings
classes.description: A frozen data class that holds application configuration loaded from environment variables, including persistence backend, database path, CORS origins, and basic auth credentials.

methods.name: str _get_env(name: str, default: str)
methods.description: Retrieves an environment variable's value with a default fallback, returning the default if the variable is unset or empty.

methods.name: bool _parse_bool(value: str, default: bool = False)
methods.description: Parses a string value into a boolean, recognizing common true/false representations.

methods.name: List[str] _parse_origins(origins_value: str)
methods.description: Parses the CORS origins string into a list, supporting '*' and comma-separated lists.

methods.name: Settings get_settings()
methods.description: Loads and constructs a Settings object using environment variables, applying defaults and parsing logic.
